title: Markup Mapping

name.description: The (optional) name of the mapping. The name is normative only, and can be used for debugging purposes. It does not affect either matching nor the markup output.

match.description: A CSS selector expression selecting the nodes that should get processed

wrap.description: Add the following HTML tags before the generated HTML. This attribute is using [Emmet](https://emmet.io) notation.

classnames.description: Add the following class names to the `class` attribute of the generated HTML

attribute.description: create new attributes for each key value pair below this property
